page.title: 15SCHOOL AND VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: The school is closely linked with the church and is the centre for most social activites in the village.The calendar of religious and social events are well attended by both parents and villagers.The school holds three services in church each year,a Harvest Festival in October,a service on Ash Wednesday and a third on Ascension Day. At all of these the pupils play a major role in the singing of hymns and in the reading of prayers and poems.The Christmas concert and carol service are much enjoyed,when the school invites the senior citizens to the dress rehearsal.The final event of the school year is Sports Day,which is always popular with the children,as are the swimming lessons in the heated outdoor pool.This is also used by other nearby schools.
